QueryResult.text: SELECT AP.USER_ID USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_UID, C.COMPONENT_CODE, O.ID OBJECT_ID, O.OBJECT_CODE, L.LOOKUP_CODE OBJECT_TYPE, AP.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, PERMISSION_CODE, PERMISSION_VALUE FROM CMN_SEC_ASSGND_OBJ_PERM_V0 AP, CMN_SEC_USERS U, CMN_SEC_OBJECTS O, CMN_COMPONENTS C, CMN_LOOKUPS L WHERE AP.USER_ID = U.ID AND AP.OBJECT_ID = O.ID AND C.ID = O.COMPONENT_ID AND L.ID = O.OBJECT_TYPE_ID
